displayName.english: Wait, can ducky even fly?
displayName.schinese: 话说回来，鸭子本来就能飞吧？
displayName.japanese: そもそもアヒルって飛べるっけ？

description.english: It can fly short distances! Whoa~ surprising!
description.schinese: 要是距离不长的话就可以！有些出乎意料呢～
description.tchinese: 短距離是可以飛的喔，意外吧～
description.japanese: 短い距離なら飛べるんだ！意外ぃ〜

displayName.english: Are you cosplaying a super bouncy ball?
displayName.schinese: 在cosplay弹力球吗？w
displayName.japanese: スーパーボールのモノマネ？ｗ

description.english: You can't get anywhere if you don't aim before flying~
description.schinese: 不好好瞄准了再飞可是前进不了一点的哦~w
description.tchinese: 不瞄準飛不過去啦～w
description.japanese: 狙って飛ばなきゃ先に進めな〜いｗ

displayName.english: Congrats on graduating from preschool~
displayName.schinese: 恭喜从幼儿园毕业～w
displayName.japanese: 保育園卒業、おめでとぉ〜ｗ

description.english: Have you properly graduated from crawling yet, I wonder?
description.schinese: 现在差不多已经学会走路，不会再爬来爬去了吧～？w
description.tchinese: 會不會已經順利從爬行畢業了呀？w
description.japanese: ちゃんとハイハイは卒業できたかしらぁ？ｗ

displayName.english: You've qualified for the Chick Club, huh♡
displayName.schinese: 够到雏鸟俱乐部的门槛了呢♡
displayName.japanese: ひよこクラブは合格ね♡

description.english: You did well to waddle all the way here~
description.schinese: 一路摇摇晃晃地走来，能到这里真不容易鸭~
description.tchinese: 用啾啾走路的步伐竟然能走到這裡耶～
description.japanese: ピヨピヨ歩きでよくここまでこれたねぇ〜

displayName.english: The view from the top is beautiful, isn't it?
displayName.schinese: 山顶的景色，很美吧？
displayName.japanese: 頂きの景色、きれいでしょ？

description.english: I gave it to you as a gift because I wanted to see this with you~
description.schinese: 人家就是想和你一起看这个，才送你礼物的哦♡
description.tchinese: 我想和你一起看這個，所以才送你這個禮物♡
description.japanese: これを一緒に観たいからプレゼントしたの♡

displayName.english: Time for a mega-ton level restart, huh♡
displayName.schinese: 来个百万吨级的从头再来吧♡
displayName.tchinese: 直接來個百萬噸級的重來一次吧♡
displayName.japanese: メガトン級にやり直しちゃえ♡

description.english: That's why you needed to improve your skills~
description.schinese: 所以说提高自己的水平很是有必要的嘛w
description.tchinese: 所以說你才需要進步嘛w
description.japanese: だから上達する必要があったってワケｗ

displayName.english: You're like the King of Jumps, huh♡
displayName.schinese: 简直就是跳跃大王呢♡
displayName.japanese: まるでジャンプの王様ね♡

description.english: Are you aiming for those perky gals~? Am I not attractive enough?
description.schinese: 是冲着那些青春活力的辣妹去的吗～？换成人家就不行吗？
description.tchinese: 你是衝著青春洋溢的辣妹來的嗎？我不行嗎？
description.japanese: ぴっちぴちのギャルがお目当て〜？ウチじゃダメ？

displayName.english: Are you actually a drinking bird toy~?
displayName.schinese: 其实不是橡皮鸭而是饮水鸟吗～？
displayName.tchinese: 其實是那種喝水玩具鳥嗎？
displayName.japanese: ホントは水飲み鳥なのぉ？

description.english: Endlessly drinking water, you're dead ringer for one!
description.schinese: 喝水喝个不停的样子简直一模一样！
description.tchinese: 一直喝水的樣子超像的！
description.japanese: 延々と水飲む姿がめちゃそっくり！

displayName.english: You're a Water Balloon Fishing Master, aren't you♡
displayName.schinese: 钓水球很有一手嘛♡
displayName.tchinese: 你是水悠悠球釣的高手嘛♡
displayName.japanese: 水ヨーヨー釣りマスターじゃん♡

description.english: You'd better catch tons for me at the next summer festival!
description.schinese: 下次夏日祭要给我钓好多好多回来哦！
description.tchinese: 下次廟會要你幫我拿一堆回來喔！
description.japanese: 次の夏祭りでいっぱい取ってもらうんだからね！

displayName.english: Ducky ducky here we go!
displayName.schinese: 冲鸭冲鸭～！
displayName.japanese: アヒル、いっきま〜す！

description.english: Get pulled by the trampoline and boing♡
description.schinese: 咻～地一下被蹦床弹起来吧♡
description.tchinese: 被彈床一拉就噗～地彈出去♡
description.japanese: トランポリンに引っ張ってもらってピョ〜ン♡

displayName.english: Ducky, flying towards the galaxy!
displayName.schinese: 直冲银河鸭！
displayName.japanese: 銀河に向かって飛べよ、アヒル！

description.english: That's a pity, but this is a high-difficulty climbing game~♡
description.schinese: 虽然有些遗憾，但这可是高难度登山游戏哦♡
description.tchinese: 雖然有點悲傷，但這真的是高難度登山遊戲喔♡
description.japanese: 悲しいけど、これ、高難易度登山なのよね♡

displayName.english: These are supposed to be your Icarus wings~
displayName.schinese: 这就是伊卡洛斯之翼啊～w
displayName.japanese: イカロスの翼ってわけぇ〜ｗ

description.english: If you fly too high, the sun's heat will evaporate all your water~!
description.schinese: 要是飞得太高的话，水就会被太阳的热量蒸发掉啦～！
description.tchinese: 飛太高會被太陽烤到，水就會蒸發啦～！
description.japanese: 飛びすぎると太陽の熱でお水は蒸発ぅ〜！

displayName.english: Kyahaha, I'm looking forward to next time♡
displayName.schinese: 咩哈哈w 真期待下一回啊～♡
displayName.tchinese: 嘻哈哈w 好期待下一次喔～♡
displayName.japanese: きゃははw次が楽しみぃ～♡

description.english: I'll squeeze out all your bodily fluids♡♡♡
description.schinese: 人家会把你的体液，全部榨干哦～♡♡♡
description.tchinese: 你的體液～通通都要被我榨乾喔～♡♡♡
description.japanese: 体液、ぜ～んぶ絞ったげるぅ～♡♡♡

displayName.english: An Onmyoji born in a temple and raised in the mountains~!?
displayName.schinese: 寺庙出身、山里长大的阴阳师～！？
displayName.tchinese: 出生在寺廟、在山裡長大的陰陽師！？
displayName.japanese: 寺生まれで山育ちの陰陽師ぃ～！？

description.english: It seems like no joke, I'm seriously going to be exorcised...♡
description.schinese: 玩笑到此为止了，真的要被降服了诶……♡
description.tchinese: 認真說會被鎮壓掉的啦…♡
description.japanese: 冗談抜きで調伏されちゃうぅぅ…♡

displayName.english: It's far from the bride training...!
displayName.schinese: 这才不是什么新娘修行呢……！
displayName.tchinese: 才不是什麼新娘修行啦…！
displayName.japanese: 別に花嫁修業じゃないって…！

description.english: And don't cry while eating your sister-in-law's homemade cooking, Big Bro...
description.schinese: 也别一边吃着表妹做的菜一边哭啊，老哥……
description.tchinese: 邊吃義妹的手作料理邊哭不要啦，歐尼～
description.japanese: 義妹の手料理食べながら泣かないでよ、おにぃ…

displayName.english: Let's go camping and have a BBQ in the mountains next time~♡
displayName.schinese: 下次去山里露营的时候一块烧烤吧～♡
displayName.tchinese: 下一次就去山裡露營烤肉吧～♡
displayName.japanese: 次は山でキャンプでBBQね〜♡

description.english: Dude, you've probably got the gear, at least, right?♡
description.schinese: 前辈，反正只是工具的话肯定有吧？♡
description.tchinese: 學長，你裝備一定都準備好了對吧？♡
description.japanese: センパイ、どうせ道具だけはあるんっしょ？♡

displayName.english: You asked if I'm not going to stop wearing my glasses, huh~?
displayName.schinese: 你之前问了人家为什么不摘眼镜，对吧～？
displayName.japanese: 眼鏡、やめないのか、ですってぇ～？

description.english: Well, those glasses are just for you, you know...!
description.schinese: 那其实是专门为你戴的，所以说啊……！
description.tchinese: 那可是限定給你的，懂嗎……！
description.japanese: あれはあんた限定なんだから、ね……！

displayName.english: Canned juice? No way, it has to be boba tea!
displayName.schinese: 罐装果汁？不是珍珠奶茶可不行！
displayName.tchinese: 罐裝飲料？沒有珍奶我可不要喔！
displayName.japanese: 缶ジュースぅ？タピオカじゃなきゃヤ！

description.english: Show me what you're worth, you Mister-idiot-loser♡
description.schinese: 让人家见识见识你的出息吧，笨比杂鱼君♡
description.tchinese: 拿出點本事吧，呆呆雜魚君♡
description.japanese: 甲斐性を見せてよ、アホザコくん♡

displayName.english: I just can't resist that fluffy, runny texture!
displayName.schinese: 拼尽全力无法战胜那松软滑嫩的口感！
displayName.tchinese: 鬆軟滑嫩的就是無法抗拒嘛！
displayName.japanese: ふわとろには勝てないんだもんっ！

description.english: How precious fresh eggs are in this world...!
description.schinese: 在这个世界上新鲜的鸡蛋是多么珍贵啊……！
description.tchinese: 在這個世界新鮮雞蛋多稀有你知道嗎…！
description.japanese: この世界で新鮮な卵がどれほど貴重か…！

displayName.english: I can't win against my Master, meow♡
displayName.schinese: 人家可赢不了主人大人喵♡
displayName.japanese: ご主人さまには勝てないびょん♡

description.english: ...D-Don't think you've won just because of this, understand?~~~
description.schinese: ……你可别就这、这样以为你真的赢了啊~~~
description.tchinese: ……可、可別以為這樣就贏了喔～～～
description.japanese: …こ、これで勝ったと思うなよぉ～～～

displayName.english: You're getting so serious about a game like this...?
displayName.schinese: 竟然对这么个游戏如此认真吗……
displayName.japanese: こんなゲームにマジになって…

description.english: Thank you for paying so much attention to me and playing with me so much~♡
description.schinese: 陪人家玩得这么尽兴，真是太感谢了……♡
description.tchinese: 謝謝你這麼用心陪我玩喔…♡
description.japanese: めいっぱい構ってくれて、ありがとぉ…♡

displayName.english: Definitely a masochist, aren't you...?
displayName.schinese: 毫无疑问是抖M呢……
displayName.japanese: 間違いなくマゾね…

description.english: Your mouth is practically grinning...
description.schinese: 这嘴角都压不住枪了嘛……
description.tchinese: 因為你嘴角都在偷笑嘛…
description.japanese: だって、口元ニヤけてるんだもん…

displayName.english: Anyone can see you're such a total masochist...!
displayName.schinese: 任谁看都是抖M呢……！
displayName.japanese: 誰がどうみてもドMね…！

description.english: You're having fun with things you can't even accomplish.
description.schinese: 明明做不到却乐在其中嘛……w
description.tchinese: 你不是在把做不到的事當樂子嗎…w
description.japanese: できないことを面白がってるじゃん…ｗ

displayName.english: On the contrary, you must be a total sadist!!!
displayName.schinese: 反过来说你也是一种抖S吧……！
displayName.japanese: 逆にドＳなんでしょ！！！

description.english: To be provoked this much and not even bat an eye...... I surrender~♡
description.schinese: 明明都被这样挑衅了却没事儿似的……我真服了啊……♡
description.tchinese: 被這樣嘲弄還能毫髮無傷…我服了…♡
description.japanese: こんなに煽られて無傷とは…参りましたぁ…♡
